content.text: I'll search for some current tech news to share with you.

input.query: tech news today August 2025 latest developments

content.content:
Web search results for query: "tech news today August 2025 latest developments"

Links: [{"title":"Apple increases U.S. commitment to $600 billion, announces ambitious program - Apple","url":"https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2025/08/apple-increases-us-commitment-to-600-billion-usd-announces-ambitious-program/"},{"title":"High Growth Tech Stocks to Watch in August 2025","url":"https://finance.yahoo.com/news/high-growth-tech-stocks-watch-093801282.html"},{"title":"Latest AI Breakthroughs and News: June, July, August 2025 | News","url":"https://www.crescendo.ai/news/latest-ai-news-and-updates"},{"title":"Technology News","url":"https://www.cnbc.com/technology/"},{"title":"Artificial intelligence | MIT News | Massachusetts Institute of Technology","url":"https://news.mit.edu/topic/artificial-intelligence2"},{"title":"News Archive | August 2025 | TechRadar","url":"https://www.techradar.com/news/archive"},{"title":"SciTechDaily - Science, Space and Technology News 2025","url":"https://scitechdaily.com/"},{"title":"8 new features in August 2025 Security Update for Windows 11 | Windows Central","url":"https://www.windowscentral.com/microsoft/windows-11/8-new-features-arriving-with-the-august-2025-security-update-for-windows-11"},{"title":"25 New Technology Trends for 2025 | Emerging Technologies 2025","url":"https://www.simplilearn.com/top-technology-trends-and-jobs-article"},{"title":"MIT Technology Review","url":"https://www.technologyreview.com/"}]

Based on my web search for the latest tech news in August 2025, here are the key developments:

## Major Business Announcements

Apple announced a new $100 billion commitment to America, a significant acceleration of its U.S. commitment that now totals $600 billion over four years.(no content)In the next four years, Apple plans to directly hire 20,000 people in the U.S. — the vast majority focused on R&D, silicon engineering, software development, and AI and machine learning.(no content)Trump vows 100% tariff on chips, unless companies are building in the U.S. and OpenAI is giving ChatGPT to the government for $1

## AI and Machine Learning Breakthroughs

Several significant AI developments occurred in August 2025:

Scientists have developed a universal AI detector that can identify deepfake videos with 98% accuracy across platforms and content types.(no content)Unlike older tools, it works on both synthetic speech and facial manipulations.(no content)Carnegie Mellon University is launching a new NSF-funded institute to accelerate mathematical discovery using AI tools. The center will develop models that can conjecture, prove, and visualize complex theorems. It aims to close the gap between symbolic reasoning and neural networks. The initiative places CMU at the forefront of AI-for-science research.(no content)Researchers have used AI to design novel battery materials with the potential to dramatically improve energy storage. The discovery could lead to longer-lasting, faster-charging, and more sustainable batteries. AI dramatically accelerated the materials discovery process, condensing years of work into weeks.

## Microsoft Windows Updates

On August 12, 2025, Microsoft is expected to start rolling out the August 2025 Security Update for Windows 11, which includes several new features and visual changes, in addition to security fixes and improvements.(no content)In this monthly update, you will find at least eight new improvements for version 24H2, including a feature to completely reset Windows Recall, additional AI actions for Click to Do, a redesigned Search settings page, and a new gamepad keyboard layout with PIN sign-in support.

## Market Conditions

In the midst of global market turbulence, highlighted by slowing U.S. job growth and renewed trade policy uncertainties, smaller-cap indexes such as the Russell 2000 and S&P MidCap 400 have been particularly hard hit, with declines of over 4% in recent weeks.

## Engineering and Manufacturing

Engineers at RMIT University have developed a new 3D-printed titanium material that costs roughly one-third of traditional materials, representing a significant advance in manufacturing technology.

These developments show August 2025 as a month of significant tech policy changes, AI breakthroughs in detection and scientific research, major corporate investments, and continued innovation in materials science and software platforms.

## Major Business Announcements

Apple announced a new $100 billion commitment to America, a significant acceleration of its U.S. commitment that now totals $600 billion over four years.(no content)In the next four years, Apple plans to directly hire 20,000 people in the U.S. — the vast majority focused on R&D, silicon engineering, software development, and AI and machine learning.(no content)Trump vows 100% tariff on chips, unless companies are building in the U.S. and OpenAI is giving ChatGPT to the government for $1
